Test Block

Style guide: block.test.a.a Variations

Test Block - Type A - A

  • block-test-a-a - default style
block-test-a-a 
<div class="{{modifier_class}}  mod-box">
  <div class="{{modifier_class}}__container  mod-box__container">
    <!-- some contents here -->
    <div class="block-test-b-a  mod-box">
      <div class="block-test-b-a__container  mod-box__container">
        <!-- some contents here -->
      </div>
    </div>  </div>
</div>
